description: The former South Carolina governor's remarks were her first on the matter since she dropped out of the presidential race. But she stopped short of formally endorsing her former rival.
title: Nikki Haley says she'll vote for Trump

description: Four plaintiffs in Florida say Hershey falsely represented several Reese's Peanut Butter products by showing "explicit carved-out artistic designs" on the wrappers being sold.
title: Hershey's lawsuit argues the company uses 'deceptive' packaging in Reese's products

description:
Everyone says you live through history, but "I don't think anyone prepared us for this much history," say the students in the Class of 2024.

For sponsor-free episodes of Consider This, sign up for Consider This+ via Apple Podcasts or at plus.npr.org. Email us at considerthis@npr.org.
title: A concentrated dose of history: The class of 2024 looks back

description: A new president in Taiwan was inaugurated this week. Lai Ching-te will now lead a Taiwan that is divided politically on many issues, including on how to confront China. We'll hear from our correspondent in Taipei and from some young Taiwanese preparing for mandatory military service.
title: Taiwan's New Government, With an Eye Towards China

description: Under the plan, the European Union will send as much as $3.25 billion in profits from frozen Russian assets to Ukraine to help finance its military and reconstruction efforts.
title: Billions from Russia's frozen assets will go to help Ukraine's military, the EU says

description: Only four staffers work at the weekly Perehoma, which means "victory." Its motto: "Don't let ordinary people be erased from history."
title: A newspaper near Ukraine's border with Russia watches for freed POWs

description: Exercises to help you cope with negative feelings around guilt (like shame or embarassment) — and motivate better behavior in the future.
title: COMIC: How to have a healthy relationship with guilt

description: The leaders of Ireland, Norway and Spain will formally recognize a Palestinian state on May 28. Why planes experience turbulence and how to keep yourself safe.
title: Ireland, Norway, Spain to recognize a Palestinian state; stay safe during turbulence

description: The new study has scientists concerned that microplastics may be contributing to reproductive health issues.
title: Plastic junk? Researchers find tiny particles in men's testicles

description: The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau is requiring buy-now, pay-later lenders to provide the same protections to shoppers as credit card companies do.
title: Buy-now, pay-later returns and disputes are about to get federal oversight

description: Regardless of what courts rule regarding SB4, a climate of distrust has permeated among immigrant and mixed-status families in Texas.
title: Immigrants are wary as an appeals court weighs legality of Texas immigration law

description: A study of tiger beetles has found a possible explanation for why they produce ultrasound noises right before an echolocating bat swoops in for the kill.
title: To escape hungry bats, these flying beetles create an ultrasound 'illusion'

description: Set during a uniquely stressful summer for one Nantucket family, Gabriella Burnham's second novel highlights the strong bonds between a mom and her daughters.
title: What's it like to live in a vacation spot when tourists leave? 'Wait' offers a window

description: Stephen King is out with a new collection of short stories. As you might expect from the reigning King of Horror, some are terrifying. Some are creepy. Others are laugh-out-loud funny.
title: Stephen King's new story took him 45 years to write. He tells NPR why

description: State laws on abortion keep changing – with new bans taking effect in some places while new protections are enacted in others. And abortion will be on the ballot in at least four states.
title: 6 key facts about abortion laws and the 2024 election

description: A new report from the Fed shows little change in family finances over the last year, but rising prices remain a big worry. And parents of children under the age of 18 feel worse off than a year ago.
title: A big survey asked Americans about their finances. Here are some trouble spots

description: Norway, Ireland and Spain recognized a Palestinian state on Wednesday in a historic move that drew immediate condemnation from Israel and jubilation from the Palestinians.
title: Norway, Ireland and Spain say they will recognize a Palestinian state

description: Multiple people died Tuesday and at least a dozen were injured when a powerful tornado tore through a small Iowa town, carving a bleak landscape of destroyed homes, shredded trees and smashed cars.
title: A tornado devastates an Iowa town and kills multiple people, authorities say
